item.title: Fanmail: Will Gaming Crash in 2025?
item.description:
This week on Gamertag Radio: A listener asked: Will there be a video game crash in 2025? We dive into the current state of the industry and what the future might hold.

Watch the award-winning film, Gamertag Radio: A Podcast Story now for free on Youtube - story.gamertagradio.com | Store: store.gamertagradio.com. Send us questions - fanmail@gamertagradio.com | Speakpipe.com/gamertagradio or 786-273-7GTR. Join our Discord - https://discord.gg/gtr chat with other GTR community member. Feed: https://audioboom.com/channels/4949308.rss

item.title: Light in the Darkness - The Iranian Church’s Response to Conflict
item.description: In this bonus episode, Elam’s Executive Director, David Yeghnazar, shares how the Iranian church has been responding to the recent conflict with Israel. You will hear encouraging stories and prayer needs for Iranian Christians at this critical time. Join us in praying for Iran’s church using free prayer resources at www.elam.com/pray-for-iran and by signing up to our regular prayer updates at www.elam.com/subscribe.
